title: The Trapzilla Interview: Lil Peep, Mexican Gang Politics, 6ix9ine, Riff Raff & More
description:
Trapzilla and his friends took over No Jumper to talk about the negative effects from rappers and record labels promoting g*ns, dr*gs, the jail system and the lack of education.
